Field Detail

PREF_FILENAME

public static java.lang.String PREF_FILENAME
Constructor Detail

LocalPrefReader

public LocalPrefReader()
Creates a new Local Preference Reader. Starts with a blank set of preferences, but loads the preference list immediately.

Method Detail

loadPreferences

public void loadPreferences()
Loads the preference information from PREF_FILENAME into the preferences Map.

savePreferences

public void savePreferences()
Saves the current map of preferences to PREF_FILENAME.

getPreference

public java.lang.String getPreference(java.lang.String key)
Returns the preference value corresponding to the given key. If the preference is not in the map, returns null. WARNING: CALLING CLASSES MUST HANDLE THE NULL CASE.

Parameters:
key - The preference name.
Returns:
The corresponding preference value, or null.

setPreference

public void setPreference(java.lang.String key,
                          java.lang.String value)
Sets the given preference name to the given preference value.

Parameters:
key - The preference name.
value - The desired value for key.
